Package org.wmn4j.notation

Class Chord

java.lang.Object
org.wmn4j.notation.Chord
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Note>, Durational
public final class Chord extends Object implements Durational, Iterable<Note>
Represents a chord. This class should be used for chords where the notes are all of same length. For polyphonic textures add voices to the Measure.

This class is immutable.

    • of

      public static Chord of(Note... n)
      Returns a chord with the given Note objects.
      Parameters:
      n - A non-empty and non-null array of Note objects
      Returns:
      a chord with the given notes
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if notes is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if notes is empty or all Note objects in notes are not of same duration

    • getNote

      public Note getNote(int fromLowest)
      Returns the Note at the given index counting from lowest staff position in this Chord. The position is indicated by the display pitch of the note (see Note.getDisplayPitch()).
      Parameters:
      fromLowest - index of note, 0 being the lowest staff positioned note in the chord
      Returns:
      the note from index fromLowest
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if fromLowest is smaller than 0 or at least the number of notes in this Chord

    • getLowest
